title: Change 'Your Workout Plan' section background to green

requirements.summary: Change the background color of the 'Your Workout Plan' banner/header section to green in WorkoutPlanView.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: The section or banner containing the text 'Your Workout Plan' has a green background color
The heading text remains legible against the green background
No other sections or views are unintentionally affected by this color change

file_operations.description: Update the background color of the banner/header section containing 'Your Workout Plan' heading to green. Apply a Tailwind green background class (e.g., 'bg-green-600') to the container element that wraps the heading text. Ensure text contrast remains accessible against the green background by adjusting text color if needed.
